assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Shandong Boan Biotechnology Co., Ltd., an integrated biopharmaceutical company, develops, manufactures, and commercializes biologics in the People's Republic of China and internationally. Its commercialized product is Boyounuo (BA1101) bevacizumab injection for the treatment of metastatic colorectal cancer, advanced metastatic or recurrent non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC), recurrent glioblastoma, epithelial ovarian, fallopian tube or primary peritoneal cancer, and cervical cancer The company's principal products include BA1102 denosumab injection to treat patients with skeletal-related events caused by multiple myeloma and bone metastases from solid tumors, as well as GCTB; and LY-CovMab for the prevention and treatment of COVID-19. It is also developing BA9101 aflibercept intraocular injection to treat patients with wet age-related macular degeneration, diabetic macular edema, retinal vein occlusion, and diabetic retinopathy; BA1104 to treat patients with melanoma, NSCLC, malignant pleural mesothelioma, RCC, classical hodgkin lymphoma, SCCHN, urothelial carcinoma, colorectal cancer, hepatocellular carcinoma, esophageal cancer, gastric cancer, gastroesophageal junction cancer, and esophageal adenocarcinoma; and BA5101 to treat patients with type 2 diabetes. In addition, the company is developing BA1105, a recombinant anti-Claudin 18.2 fully human IgG1 monoclonal antibody; BA1201, an anti-PD-L1/TGF-ß bifunctional fusion protein intended for the treatment of SCLC, NSCLC, cervical cancer, urothelial carcinoma, and advanced gastrointestinal tumors; BA1106, a CD25 fully human monoclonal antibody; BA1202, a bispecific antibody; BA1301, an anti-Claudin 18.2 antibody-drug conjugate; BA2101, an IL4R long-acting molecular antibody; and BA-CovMab, a human monoclonal antibody. Shandong Boan Biotechnology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Yantai, China. Shandong Boan Biotechnology Co., Ltd. is subsidiary of Luye Pharma Group Ltd.
